frame.name: People_by_age
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words for individuals as viewed in terms of their age. The <fen>Person</fen> is conceived of as independent of other specific individuals with whom they have relationships and independent of their participation in any particular activity. They may have a <fen>Descriptor</fen>, <fen>Origin</fen>, <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen>, or <fen>Ethnicity</fen>. A specific <fen>Age</fen> may sometimes be specified as well.
<ex><fex name="Person">He</fex> is a <fex name="Age">12-year-old</fex> <t>kid</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition: <def-root>The human being of a certain age.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.
</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition:
<def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Person</fen> is associated.
<ex>Hey look, it's that <t>kid</t> <fex name="coa">from the restaurant</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: koet.n
lexUnit.definition: met een klein kopje, die je vaak in sloten ziet zwemmen
